text: "Think of Laura" is a 1983 song by Christopher Cross. It was taken from his second studio album Another Page. It went to number 9 in the United States. It was his last top 10 single to date. It was used in the ABC soap opera General Hospital. It was covered by Boyz II Men as a tribute to singer Aaliyah. Category:1983 songs Category:Christopher Cross songs Category:Boyz II Men songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Think of Laura
